imdb.plot outline: Princess Peach has been kidnapped by Bowser. Mario try's his hardest to save his special one. But his hat get's knocked off Bowser's air ship. And Mario falls down to the Cap Kingdom. Cappy finds Mario's hat and gives it to him. Cappy's sister Tiara was kidnapped as well by Bowser. Mario and Cappy team up to save their loved ones.
imdb.title: Super Mario Odyssey Plush
plot: Princess Peach has been kidnapped by Bowser. Mario try's his hardest to save his special one. But his hat get's knocked off Bowser's air ship. And Mario falls down to the Cap Kingdom. Cappy finds Mario's hat and gives it to him. Cappy's sister Tiara was kidnapped as well by Bowser. Mario and Cappy team up to save their loved ones.::SuperMarioGabe
